effect_entries.effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Restores 1/16 (6.25%) holder's max HP at the end of each turn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせると　ポケモンの　ＨＰが
戦闘の　あいだ　少しずつ
回復する。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder’s HP is slowly but steadily
restored throughout every battle.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Fa recuperare gradualmente i PS durante la lotta.

La delicadeza del pañuelo fortalece los
movimientos de tipo Normal. Debe llevarlo
un Pokémon.

Ein Item, das einem Pokémon zum Tragen
gegeben werden kann. Es füllt im Kampf
stetig KP auf.

Objet à tenir. Permet de restaurer graduellement
les PV du porteur durant le combat.

지니게 하면 포켓몬의 HP가
배틀을 하는 동안 조금씩
회복된다.

もたせると　ポケモンの　ＨＰが
せんとうの　あいだ　すこしずつ
かいふくする。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder’s HP is gradually restored
during battle.
